item.title: Documentation for Redux toolkit integration
item.description:
A simple example to showcase how all things fit togather

  • sidebarCollapsibleSlice (actual slice)
  • store (central store)
  • MasterLayout Component (slice consumed)

1. sidebarCollapsibleSlice

This slice manages the width of the sidebar using Redux state.
